data_description.device_type: Common configuration or specific device configuration

data_description.refresh_period_sec: Refresh period in seconds. Warning heavy calculs are done at each period. Don't refresh to often
data_description.power_consumption_entity_id: the entity_id of the net power consumption sensor. Net power should be negative if power is exported to grid.
data_description.power_production_entity_id: the entity_id of the solar power production sensor.
data_description.sell_cost_entity_id: The entity_id which holds the current energy sell price.
data_description.buy_cost_entity_id: The entity_id which holds the current energy buy price.
data_description.sell_tax_percent_entity_id: The energy resell tax percent (0 to 100)
data_description.smooth_production: If checked, the solar production will be smoothed to avoid hard variation
data_description.battery_soc_entity_id: Battery state of charge in %. If you don't have battery, keep it empty
data_description.raz_time: Time to reset active time counters. Should be before first exposure to sunlight but not too early to allow enough time for night activation

data_description.name: The name of the device
data_description.power_max: The maximum power of the device when activated
data_description.check_usable_template: The template to check if the device is usable. Example `True ` or `states('sensor.my_sensor') | float > 10` (don't forgeet double accolades)
data_description.check_active_template: The template to check if the device is active. Keep it empty for switch type device or apparented. Example `is_state('sensor.my_sensor', 'hvac_mode', 'heat')` (with double accolades)
data_description.duration_min: The minimum duration of the device when turned on in minutes
data_description.duration_stop_min: The minimum duration of the device when turned off in minutes
data_description.action_mode: The action mode of the device. `service` to service call a service to turn on or off or `event` to send an event to turn on or off
data_description.activation_service: The service to activate the device. Example `switch/turn_on` or `climate/set_hvac_mode:cool`
data_description.deactivation_service: The service to deactivate the device. Example `switch/turn_off` or `climate/set_hvac_mode:off`
